title: I Am Your King: The Series
overview: From the king game in the drunken circle to the drunken circle of friend. With only 1 rules., Who ever hold the Kings card can order anyone to do anything he wants. Therefore the gang, New, Matt, Bright, August, and Junho will have to get together before pond leave for his study in China. The gang will play the king game. Little did they know that their king will order a lifechanging decision that will change the friendship forever...
